Title: A More Perfect Union
Writer: Jonathan Nolan (created by), Melissa Scrivner-Love, Lucas O'Connor (executive story editor), Tony Camerino (story editor)
Actors: Jim Caviezel, Kevin Chapman, Amy Acker, Sarah Shahi
Plot: The Machine sends Reese and Finch to a wedding to protect a pair of POIs before their nuptials. Also, Fusco becomes angry at being kept in the dark by the team and takes it upon himself to investigate a string of missing person reports.
